actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the number of taxable years to which a net operating loss may be carried back.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to seven the number of years which a net operating loss may be carried back for purposes of the loss deduction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the number of taxable years to which a net operating loss may be carried back.
